name: "Save The Birds" Board Game by Olivia Bouler
description:
PRE-SALE: SAVE 20% ON OLIVIA'S COLLECTION WITH PROMO CODE: WINGS20 AT CHECKOUT !!!
Olivia’s game is a fun and interactive experience where six birds must navigate their way back to their natural habitats, avoiding hazards and celebrating the America's natural resources.

The game board is printed on canvas and can be rolled up to fit into a tube or backpack. All of the components of this game are made of recycled materials. This game is suitable for ages 5 years and up and includes a mini-booklet with fun facts about birds, and inspiring messages by Olivia.

The game includes an 18"” x 24” Printed canvas game board, playing cards, die, and 6 game pieces in a reusable cardboard tube.

A portion of proceeds from Olivia’s Collection will benefit the Cornell Lab of Ornithology. 

***********
ABOUT OLIVIA:
Olivia Bouler is Gryphon Design Collective's first ever Youth Ambassador! We felt that kids can inspire other kids in fantastic ways, so we asked Olivia and her brother, Jackson, to share their passion for birds with us. She may be only 13 years old, but this provocative young artist has already raised over $200,000 to help "Save the Birds." She has been named a White House Champion of Change and has a blog for other kids on the Huffington Post. As per Olivia's request, a portion of the proceeds of this game will benefit the Cornell Lab for Ornithology. (She thinks they're "awesome," and so do we.) For more info on Olivia and our Youth Ambassador program, please visit http://gryphondesigncollective.com/about-gryphon/youth-ambassadors/

categories.name: Save the Birds Collection by Olivia Bouler

name: Wordless Story Game - My Trip to Mars
description:
Let your child become the storyteller. These wordless story cards empower kids to create inspiring, fun, and silly tales about a trip to Mars. Perfect for children who are pre-readers or mastering their vocabulary- our wordless story cards can be laid out to create countless narratives. 

Trip to Mars is beautifully illustrated by American artist Cat Addams. The cards are double laminated to withstand even the most rigorous attention. They measure 5"x7" and come in a durable keepsake tin.

description:

name: Learning Game - MY FIRST WORDS - English, Spanish and French
description:
This isn't your ordinary classroom tool! Our engaging tri-lingual card game helps children learn while they play. 

These oversized playing cards are perfect for little hands and can be used as a matching game, a memory game, or as a language tool. Beautifully illustrated by Zsanett Szanto, from Budapest, these cards are double laminated to withstand even the most rigorous attention.

Cards measure 3.5"x5" and come in a durable keepsake tin.

name: Learning Game - SAFARI ANIMALS -  English, Spanish and French
description:

These matching animal cards measure 3.5"x5" and come in a durable keepsake tin.

name: Learning Game - What We Wear - English/French
description:
Our engaging bi-lingual card game helps children learn while they play! Funny animals enjoy a day at the beach while showing off their fabulous fashions. A great tool to help children become  familiar with basic clothing terms in multiple languages, while matching up the playing cards. 

These durable playing cards are laminated with a silky matte finish and are perfect for little hands. The cards can be used as a matching game, a memory game, or as a language tool.  Beautifully illustrated by American artist Sheralyn Barnes, these cards are sturdy enough to withstand the most rigorous attention and practical enough to wipe clean.

These cards measure 3.5"x5" and come in a durable keepsake tin. Made in USA with recycled materials. Choose Spanish/ English or French/ Spanish. Approximately 32 cards (16 pairs).

WANT THIS ITEM GIFT WRAPPED OR SHIPPED TO RECIPIENT? No problem! Please add Gryphon gift wrap to your cart and let us know if you would like a special message on your gift card.

Check out this card game at the following retail locations: NYC- ABC Carpet and Home, Powerhouse Arena, Norman and Jules, UncommonGoods. PDX- Maison Home Wares, BOS- Portobello Road, Magpie : )

name: Personalized Children's Book "Monster In My Lunch Pail"
description: ORDERING INSTRUCTIONS: Before you add this item to your cart, please click here to provide the information needed about the child for the story. Once submitted, you will be prompted to return to this page to complete your order. This charming story is personalized with details about your child, and will inspire little readers to question their own fears of those who seem different. ABOUT MONSTER IN MY LUNCH PAIL At Little Gryphon Books, your child will become the lead character in this story, and his name will be featured on the cover and throughout the book. "Monster In My Lunch Pail" follows a charmingly fluffy creature through a perfectly ordinary day. Ordinary, at least, until he discovers a monster in his lunch pail. Our creature humorously faces his fears and learns that those who are different are not so bad after all. In fact, they could end up becoming best friends. This original story is playfully written by Michele Slobin, with dazzling illustrations by Juan Milewski. Our books are handmade in the USA out of recycled papers.

name: Personalized Children's Book "What Barkley Saw," A Birth Story
description: ORDERING INSTRUCTIONS: Before you add this item to your cart, please click here to provide the information needed to personalize your story. Once submitted, you will be prompted to return to this page to complete your order. ABOUT WHAT BARKLEY SAW This is a unique birth story as seen through the eyes of the family dog. We personalize the names of the new parents and baby in this fun keepsake book.   Barkley is living a perfect doggie life. One day he notices that his owner's belly is changing, and tries to sniff out what is going on.    A perfect gift for expectant parents and children that welcome a new baby into the home. "What Barkley Saw" is thoughtfully written by Geoff Rogers with vibrant illustrations by Jenikah Joy. Our books are handmade in the USA and our products are made out of recycled materials. We dedicate a share of profits to charity (See our charity page for more information).

name: Personalized Children's Book "Leyla & The Golden Eggs"
description: ORDERING INSTRUCTIONS: Before you add this item to your cart, please click here to provide the information needed about the child for the story. Once submitted, you will be prompted to return to this page to complete your order. Due to the customized nature of this book, please give us 2-4 weeks to create and bind your special edition. ABOUT THE GOLDEN EGGS Your child will become the lead character in this story, and her name will be featured on the cover and throughout the book. "The Golden Eggs" is a tribute to brave children everywhere! It is a wonderful story of a girl who never stops believing, even when life gets hard. Our heroine has a treasure, five eggs made of gold. With a great sense of humor, the author leads us through the ordeal she faces as five remarkable animals steal those golden eggs. When she thinks that all might be lost, she turns the corner and finds that something even more valuable has come to her! This uplifting story will stimulate your child to remember the importance of faith and persistence. It is superbly written by Tamara Fenjan and brought alive with vibrant illustrations by Zsanett Szántó. Our books are handmade in the USA out of recycled papers. We dedicate a share of profits to charity (See our charity page for more information).

name: Personalized Children's Book "Lucas & The Golden Eggs"
description: ORDERING INSTRUCTIONS: Before you add this item to your cart, please click here to provide the information needed about the child for the story. Once submitted, you will be prompted to return to this page to complete your order. Due to the customized nature of this book, please give us 2-4 weeks to create and bind your special edition. ABOUT THE GOLDEN EGGS At Little Gryphon Books, your child will become the lead character in this story, and his name will be featured on the cover and throughout the book. "The Golden Eggs" is a tribute to brave children everywhere! It is a wonderful story of a boy who never stops believing, even when life gets hard. Our hero has a treasure, five eggs made of gold. With a great sense of humor, the author leads us through the ordeal he faces as five remarkable animals steal those golden eggs. When he thinks that all might be lost, he turns the corner and finds that something even more valuable has come to him! This uplifting story will stimulate your child to remember the importance of faith and persistence. It is superbly written by Tamara Fenjan and Michele Slobin and brought alive with vibrant illustrations by Zsanett Szántó. Our books are handmade in the USA out of recycled papers. We dedicate a share of profits to charity. (See our charity page for more information)

name: Image Capture Children's Book "Lady Bouncealot and the Land of Snooze"
description: ORDERING INSTRUCTIONS: Before you add this item to your cart, please click here to provide the information needed about your Lady Bouncealot. You will be asked to upload high-resolution images at your convenience, (a head shot or portrait, a profile and a 3/4 profile photo) of the child and provide basic information about her for the story. Once submitted, you will be prompted to return to this page to complete your order. Due to the customized nature of this book, please give us 2-4 weeks to create and bind your special edition. ABOUT LADY BOUNCEALOT Who says a little princess can't be a brave and mighty knight? Introducing Gryphon's "Image Capture" Books! Lady Bouncealot is the first in it's series to paint your child right into the story! Our heroine will look like your child and be named after her! A delightful bed-time story aimed to capture a child's imagination. Our princess is curious about life beyond the castle walls. One night, when the world is asleep, she disguises herself as a mighty knight and sets out on a great adventure... Celebrated Ukrainian artist, Yuriy Ratush has created a magical world with these unique illustrations. All photo images are re-rendered and hand set to truly capture the personality of your child.

name: Image Capture Children's Book "Sir Bouncealot and the Land of Snooze"
description: ABOUT SIR BOUNCEALOT Introducing Gryphon's "Image Capture" Books! Sir Bouncealot is the first in it's series to paint your child right into the story! Our hero will look like your child and be named after him. Celebrated Ukrainian artist, Yuriy Ratush has created a magical world with these unique illustrations. All photo images are re-rendered and hand set to truly capture the personality of your child. A delightful bed-time story, this book can be enjoyed by young and old alike. ORDERING INSTRUCTIONS: Before you add this item to your cart, please click here to provide the information needed about your little Bouncealot. You will be asked to upload high-resolution images (a head shot or portrait, a profile, and a 3/4 profile photo) of the child at your convenience, and provide basic information about him for the story. Once submitted, you will be prompted to return to this page to complete your order. Due to the customized nature of this book, please give us 2-4 weeks to create and bind your special edition.

name: "Curator's Choice" The Coquettish Series of Fine Art Cards
description:
Somewhere between sexy, flirtatious and fun, is where our coquettish series lands. Let us select 9 fine art cards for you, as an introduction to our acclaimed design team. The 4.25"x6" cards are accompanied by cream linen envelopes. Your collection is packaged in a keepsake tin box.

Thank you for supporting our Global Team of artists and designers. Cheers!

name: Art Card Collection - "Monster In My Lunch Pail"
description:
These playful notecards were designed by Juan Milewski, an Argentinean  artist. They make a perfect gift when paired with the "Monster In My Lunch Pail" personalized story book or a Monster-themed designer notebook.

This set of notecards features 3 scenes from "Monster In My Lunch Pail". Each card is blank inside and measures 4 1/4" x 6" (11 cm X 15cm). This fine paper collection is accompanied by cream linen envelopes and comes in a beautiful blue box.

All fine art cards and envelopes are made in the USA of 100% recycled paper by a certified Green Printer.  

This Designer Series is available only through Gryphon Design Collective.

name: NOTECARD TRIO: "Three Birds" by Olivia Bouler
description:
Gryphon is proud to introduce our first Youth Ambassador- Olivia Bouler. 

This beautiful box set of 6 fine art cards and 6 cream linen envelopes offers 3 unique designs. Each card is blank inside and measures 4 1/4" x 6" (11 cm X 15cm). The cards are sent in a lovely navy recycled gift box.

All fine art cards and envelopes are made in the USA of 100% recycled paper by a certified Green Printer.

Proceeds from the sale of Olivia's products will benefit Cornell University's Ornithology Lab for the study and preservation of endangered birds.

Olivia came to public attention for her advocacy during the Gulf Oil Spill. Now, at 13 years old, she has raised over $200,000 to save birds. She has been named a White House Champion of Change, ASPCA Kid of the year, Audubon Artist Inspiring Conservation, and YSA 25 Most Influential Young People.
